p: Dengue infection was found in all the age groups in our study but highest was seen in the age group of 21â€“30 yrs which is in accordance with the findings of the study done by Sodani et al. (2015), Paul et al. (2018) and Gupta et al. (2016). Dengue infection is not age specific and not only children but adults are also equally under threat of dengue infection.
